item.title: This gym stock could see a boost from increase weight-loss pill use, says Stifel
item.description: Planet Fitness could be among the beneficiaries of the GLP-1 craze, according to Stifel.

item.title: Trump wants tech companies to foot the bill for new power plants because of AI
item.description: Utility bills are rising in many parts of the U.S. despite Trump's promise to lower energy prices during his presidential campaign.

item.title: Honeywell is a buy as planned break-up continues, JPMorgan says
item.description: Investors should scoop up shares of Honeywell before the company completes its break-up, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: Here are Needham's top picks for 2026
item.description: Needham compiled its list by polling researchers for their ideas about which stocks would outperform in 2026.

item.title: Josh Brown: This real estate name on our Best Stocks list has seen a major transformation
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo take a look at this real estate name on their list.
